events.message: I am filing a claim for my car after the collision that happened yesterday afternoon. The vehicle sustained severe front-end damage.
The claim for the reported car accident has been categorized under Auto Accident for further processing and investigation.
An agent has been assigned to your case to provide assistance and guide you through the claim process as smoothly as possible.
We have officially acknowledged your auto accident claim and will start reviewing the details you provided immediately.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of your driving license to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents including the accident police report and vehicle photographs have been submitted for your review.
The investigation into the circumstances of your car accident claim has begun to establish liability and damage assessment.
The investigation regarding your vehicle collision claim is complete, confirming the details you submitted were accurate.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on the assessed damages and policy coverage for your auto accident claim.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the claims process and communication during your car accident claim.
Your claim for the vehicle collision has been approved and we are processing the payment as per the settlement agreed.
Payment has been issued to cover the repairs of your car according to the approved settlement terms.
The claim has been officially closed following successful payment and resolution of your auto accident case.
